review_and_appreciate:
Review and Appreciate: Did you take a step yesterday in the direction of greater trust in yourself? If so,
            notice how good it feels. See you on The Path.
quote: “It always seems impossible until it's done\" Nelson Mandela

step_of_the_day.title:
Focus on one step at a time to support achieving a difficult goal. Finding a way to move forward (Pillars
            #1, 5, & 9)
step_of_the_day.content:
Life is full of uncertainty. Today that seems truer than ever before. One way we get stuck in our efforts to
            achieve our goals is wanting the certainty that what we do will work out; that we won’t be rejected,
            disappointed, or make a mistake. If you think that the process of successfully achieving a goal takes, say,
            ten steps, you might get stuck at the first step, even though the danger may be further down the road, at
            the fifth step. Taking steps 1-4 that are not so dangerous however, might give greater support and certainty
            when you get to step 5.

action_step:
Notice where a fear of a negative outcome is stopping you from moving forward. Identify initial steps that
            you are capable of doing – before arriving at a more difficult or scary step - and do them. Once done,
            notice if this makes the difficult steps less scary.
journal_entry: What stops you from moving forward with important actions?
